p: In this study, the manganese concentration in the phosphate bath was increased by using manganese carbonate, which readily reacts with the phosphoric acid contained in the bath to form the (V) manganese (II) phosphate according to the following reaction: 3MnCO 3 + 2H 3PO 4 → Mn 3(PO 4) 2 + 3CO 2↑ + 3H 2O (10)
